com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.api

Interface IPersistorScan

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICoalesceComponent, ICoalesceSetup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScan, AfterLastModifiedScanImpl, FileScanImpl

    public interface IPersistorScan
extends ICoalesceComponent, ICoalesceSetup
    This interface is used for creating different scanning logic to retrieve a result set.
    Author:
    n78554

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Scan using default filters.

      void setReturnedColumns(Set<String> columns)
      Sets the columns required by operations that will use the results of this scan.
      void setSource(ICoalesceSearchPersistor source)
      Sets the source that the scan will be executed against to create a result set.

      • finished

        void finished(boolean successful,
              CachedRowSet rows)
        Called when the driver running the scan completes to indicate whether is successfully completed. This is used to persist data such as the last successful run.
        Parameters:
        successful -
        rows -
